mapper.insert: insert into SHELTER(GROUPNAME, LOCATION, PHONE) values (#{groupName}, #{location}, #{phone})
mapper.select: select * from SHELTER order by SNUMBER
select * from SHELTER where not SNUMBER = 0 order by SNUMBER

select count(*) from SHELTER
and ( GROUPNAME like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or LOCATION like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or PHONE like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )
